SELECT replies, cmt_id, cmt_content, regist_date, update_date, regist_ip, update_ip, cmt_ref, cmt_step, cmt_level, ref_mem_name, mem_id, mem_name, password, auth, image, channel_name, post_id FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, A.* FROM ( SELECT (select count(cmt_id) FROM cmt WHERE cmt_ref = c.cmt_ref and cmt_level != 0) replies, c.cmt_id, c.cmt_content, c.regist_date, c.update_date, c.regist_ip, c.update_ip, c.cmt_ref, c.cmt_step, c.cmt_level, c.ref_mem_name, m.mem_id, m.mem_name, m.password, m.auth, m.image, m.channel_name, c.post_id FROM cmt c, member m WHERE c.mem_id = m.mem_id AND c.post_id = #{postId} AND c.cmt_level = 0 ORDER BY c.cmt_ref, c.cmt_step ) A ) B WHERE rn between #{start} and #{end}
